text: Egh Kraisɨn akam ian navir averiabar ikɨ gavgafigh. Eghtɨ ia vaghvagh nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ko fofozibar gɨn mangɨva uarira uarir sure damuva egh akurvazir akam uari danɨng. Egh Ighiabar Akɨnafarimɨn aven ighiabar amuva, egh Iesusɨn ziam fer ighiabar amuva, egh Godɨn Duam ian navir averiabagh atɨzir ighiabar amu. Dughiar ia ighiabar amuamim, ia uan navir averiabar God mɨnabɨ.
